title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.111 - Employee benefit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.111 - Employee benefit

State Regulations
A pension provision, retirement allowance, insurance
coverage, paid vacation, sick leave, and holiday time off or other cost
representing a present or future return to an employee, which is neither
deducted on a payroll nor paid for by the employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.111

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
